message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product for the price of $1,300,000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be a great addition to your business. I'm confident you'll see the value in this offer. Let me know your thoughts!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not sure I can meet your price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,150,000 is unfortunately too low for me to consider. I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000. This reflects a fair compromise, and I'm confident this price still represents a strong value proposition for you. Let's see if we can find common ground here.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $1,250,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,225,000. I believe this is a fair price that still reflects the value of the product.
